problem.markdown:
>>Now change the height of the arch. What happens to the compressive force, C, in the arch as the height increases?<<
( ) the compressive force, C, increases (x) the compressive force, C, decreases ( ) the compressive force, C, remains the same
[explanation] Explanation: as the height of the arch increases, the compressive force decreases. The closer you are to vertical the lower the force will be. [explanation]
problem.p: Now change the height of the arch. What happens to the compressive force, C, in the arch as the height increases?

choicegroup.label: Now change the height of the arch. What happens to the compressive force, C, in the arch as the height increases?
choicegroup.choice: the compressive force, C, remains the same

div.p: Explanation: as the height of the arch increases, the compressive force decreases. The closer you are to vertical the lower the force will be.
